website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive price tag for a vessel faucet that's offered in many designs and finishes.
pros: Waterfall design in the faucet to give you a great look that will grab the attention of your guests
Includes all of the accessories and parts you'll need, making it a really good value
Valve has been tested and rated for up to 500,000 openings and closings
cons: This style of faucet runs noisily, especially with its tall spout height

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful faucet and works great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful faucet and works great. We had to adjust water flow because of how much water this pumps out, but it looks great on our farmhouse sink. I will update if I have any issues but so it's perfect as was the price
customer_reviews.author: CaileeM

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a tricky space.
customer_reviews.text: Good finish and performance. Perfect height for vessel style sink. I made a set of cabinets and a vanity in a Shaker/apothecary style and needed a sink/faucet solution that fit a very small, tight space yet would allow a full size sink and some counter space. This faucet perfectly matched the brushed nickel traditional hardware I chose for the cabinetry. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with our purchase!
customer_reviews.text: You absolutely cannot go wrong with this faucet! It is beautiful and I can tell you that the price is absolutely no indication of the quality! We ordered 2 as our Master Bathroom has 2 vanities and we love the way they look. They are very heavy, well made faucets.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Bradac

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking and sturdy faucet! It goes perfectly with our white vessel sink. The handle can be a little sensitive, so it's important to position your sink properly. It's easy to clean, and the brushed look hides marks from normal wear and tear. We've been using it for about 6 months so far with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and look for a rustic mountain cabin reno. Used with clear glass slipper vessel sink. As posted, supply lines cannot be fully open or water shoots far - no big deal for me. Good weight and overall quality. The inside area where water comes out is a slightly different color, but no one can see it.
customer_reviews.author: MSP

customer_reviews.title: We love this faucet
customer_reviews.text: We love this faucet. We had actually found a similar one at Lowes but it was significantly higher. Packaging was nicely done. There were no directions which wasn't that big of a deal. It is a great looking faucet with our porcelain bowl sink. We live in a log cabin so it matches the look well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Not installed Yet
customer_reviews.text: Hi! The faucet is beautiful and sturdy. Seems easy to install, but this is a new build and the plumber comes in next Monday to install. So, once I see it "fixed", I can then give you more of a critique and pics too! So far so good right now.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great faucet. Replaced the old one very easily with this item and had it installed in 20 minutes. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B.

customer_reviews.title: Aquafaucet Waterfall Bathroom Faucet in brushed nickel.
customer_reviews.text: Faucet is beautiful, stylish and well-made---I was truly amazed at the low price--less than half and more than comparable faucets---my new bathroom is elegant and very up to date with my new vessel sink and this beautiful, tall waterfall faucet--so glad I looked on line before I bought at the "big" stores with their"big" prices! Hope all my future purchases are this great! Carla Chenelle.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Chenelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This item was awesome it doesn't have a name on it but I believe it's made by Delta because of the symbol on it. Was very easy to install anyone could do it Very nice water flow couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Herd

customer_reviews.title: Too loud
customer_reviews.text: Bought the first one had to return it because the inside was unfinished. Bought a second one never turned up. I liked the style so much thought the third time would be a charmer. Wrong. Finally got it installed and it's the loudest thing ever. But I decided to keep it since my plumber was waiting on it for so long to finish the bathroom. He lowered the water pressure so it won't sound so loud when the water is coming through the faucet. He asked me why I got such a cheap one. Paid $70 It looks nice but buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: LDH

customer_reviews.title: Poor manufacturing quality
customer_reviews.text: Paid premium price for the material and installation only to find it leaking after a couple of hours following the installation. Now I have to buy another faucet and pay for installation again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks High end!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement after 6 years bathroom faucet from Lowe’s took a crap. A old friend came to the house recently and asked about the faucet in the powder room. I told him it cam from Amazon, he was shocked thought it came from a fancy dealer and cost 500.00 Dollar. Looks very high end. So thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Miss bro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this faucet for our main bathroom and have received tons of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany J. Snakenberg

customer_reviews.title: It was more sturdy than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this faucet to install in a client's home during a bathroom remodel I was doing. It arrived on time and was exactly as described. It was more sturdy than I anticipated, easy to install and quite honestly, it was a gorgeous faucet, especially for the price. As a contractor I strive for excellence for my clients and I'd have no reservations ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph J Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: They're pretty! If you look closely
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty! If you look closely, the color isn't consistent though. Fades to a bronze color in some spots. But not too noticeable if your not looking close. Water comes out fast, so handle only needs to be lifted a bit. We've had to warn guests because it's pretty unexpected, & you'll end up with water splashing on you if you're not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty, visually beautiful faucet. I could not be any happier with it. We have just installed it. I'm looking forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these and they look really nice. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Dont go chasing waterfalls but do buy this faucet that looks like a waterfall.
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful and works like a champ. Is a bit on the loud side because of the pour height from the spout to bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Hot/Cold mixer went bad immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing but. . . After 1 week would only put out hot water. There is a hot/cold flow control valve behind a small plastic plug on the faucet. This became loose and only hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff King

customer_reviews.title: Great looking waterfall faucet at a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.text: Comparable faucets at the big box stores were going to be $150+. Well constructed and a breeze to install.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the quality
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is beautiful. Looks amazing with our vessel sink.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I have installed a vessel bowl sink, and this faucet is just the prefect match for our master bathroom. easy glide handle makes using the sink a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Michel

customer_reviews.title: Broken handle
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this, but nan it shoots out some serious water. Adjusted the supply lines and it helped. However, after less than a year, the handle broke off. Very disappointed in the craftsmanship of this whenit doesn’t even last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast and for the best price. Very satisfied. This old fashioned charmer doesn't disappoint. Love the old time country feel and charm of this pump look alike faucet. The water pours out and delights all ages.
customer_reviews.author: JTS

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, works great, and wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice waterfall faucet. Sturdy, works well, creates a nice flow and really looks good over the vessel sink.
customer_reviews.author: RealRod

customer_reviews.title: Not functional
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty unit but the spout is not tilted enough. Water pools in the spout and with time will have hard water deposits. Bought two, one for mine and another for my husbands vanities, will tolerate them for a while but will be buying something better in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Martinez

customer_reviews.title: The product came packed very nicely, it seems very well made
customer_reviews.text: The product came packed very nicely, it seems very well made.it was easy to install. The only thing I don't like about it is when you turn the water on it is loud and you can not turn it on much because if you do the water goes out the sink.
customer_reviews.author: marian lawson

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love with this faucet immediately
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this faucet immediately. It is a keeper..Do not turn on full blast or it will spray water towards the outer bowl and possibly get you wet..If you like unique than get it..If you like traditional buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Nevada Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We really love this tap - works very well with our oval vessel sink.
customer_reviews.author: StormLrd

customer_reviews.title: Good choice!
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased and installed the faucet with a clear glass vessel sink in our master bath. It is a good quality, thought the pricing was reasonable, and it looks great. It was easy to install and use. We are hoping to enjoy using it for many years!
customer_reviews.author: Russ R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful waterfall
customer_reviews.text: Love this faucet. As you can see it looks beautiful and it’s very sturdy. Easy to install took 15 minutes. Will be buying 2 more for the master bathroom remodel.
customer_reviews.author: mishie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but loud
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty faucet but is not a quiet one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Dont waist the money
customer_reviews.text: Had not been installed for 1 year and something busted inside and water came flowing out at the ring below the top. It also rusted inside were the water flows from.
customer_reviews.author: littlemissyjean

customer_reviews.title: Look and work beautifully. The water lines were a little difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: Look and work beautifully. The water lines were a little difficult to install into the faucet, but once they were installed, the rest of the installation was a walk in the park!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly s.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the faucet- the style, the quality of workmanship and design. There is nothing I don't like.
customer_reviews.author: walter d munn

customer_reviews.title: The faucet does look great with our vessel sink
customer_reviews.text: The faucet does look great with our vessel sink. I think our water pressure is normal but at first it sprayed across the counter as the spigot is not slanted very much. We also had to put extra silicone caulking around the stopper as it was leaking slightly. After turning down the pressure, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Light

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL VESSEL FAUCET!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, but bought a second one in different color that matched better. It's a great buy even though had to return.
customer_reviews.author: cathy ellis

customer_reviews.title: This faucet works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This faucet works great for the price. It’s exactly what we wanted. The water supply lines are 24 inches so I had to order longer lines for my installation but they were easy to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Faucet is good quality and very easy to install. Perfect for a vessel sink. really happy with product
customer_reviews.author: nvesteasy

customer_reviews.title: ... design change but when it arrived I was very pleased with the look and quality
customer_reviews.text: I had to send it back due to design change but when it arrived I was very pleased with the look and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It was an easy installation and works beautifully. It's in our busiest bathroom. My husband said the instructions that came with the faucet didn't match the faucet we received, but he knew what to do and for us, it didn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M. Leggett

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using it a month but it is great quality, very substantial. For the price Im very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: MobileReader

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful product!! Very nice quality. Have not installed yet but very anxious to do so. Very quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: michelle lentvorsky

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our log cabin. Happy we purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Boncek

customer_reviews.title: fabulous faucet!!
customer_reviews.text: best looking faucet!! i love it! i love the sound of the water running, like an old pump!!
customer_reviews.author: Janine Stacy Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Finish
customer_reviews.text: I recommend a bowl sink for this faucet. The water pressure is extreme (love) and really cleans your hands. I feel the water gets hot faster with this unit than any other faucets in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it, it’s beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is is so easy to install and seems very well made. I just installed it last month and didn’t take 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Withrow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product At an unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product At an unbeatable price. There was a missing supply line in one of the faucets but Im working with the seller to get that resolved.
customer_reviews.author: P.A.

customer_reviews.title: Really Loved them and so badly wanted them to work.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered four of these in stainless for a remodel. We got two oil rubbed bronze and two stainless. One of the stainless's spout was out of square and looked like it happened in the manufacturing process. The one remaining one had a good feel to it but had some very sharp edges in the spout itself and I worried that someone would cut a finger on it. One of the popup drains had scuff marks on it as well. I didn't open the other three it investigate those. Unfortunately they aren't what we thought they would be and I'm sending all four back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G

customer_reviews.title: Faucets functions as it should and an amazing price! I had to get longer supply hoses
customer_reviews.text: Faucets functions as it should and an amazing price! I had to get longer supply hoses. It that was because of my placement va supply line.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Unique Faucet
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is unusual and looks exactly like it was pictured! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: L. Bearden

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy.it leaked 2 days later damaged my $800 vanity.
customer_reviews.author: shoman

customer_reviews.title: Did not get all the parts as described
customer_reviews.text: Did not get the pop up drain that said in the description was included! There was a spot for it in the box but was missing! Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Nikolelee

customer_reviews.title: Looking nice, a bit loud - great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely with my vessel sink. 4* for being a bit loud when the water is on. 5* for a great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Even better than it looks here
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is gorgeous; even better than it looks in the picture. I was torn between a number of faucets, but I'm glad I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Tatarka

customer_reviews.title: Nice faucet, looks well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice with the exception of and like another post. The stem that secures it to the top is not long enough. I have to modify it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would be great to have more instructions for installation but great value and looks/works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dribbles
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and it functioned well when we put it in. Problem is the water stays in the little trough constantly and then mineral deposits build up on the edge or the lip of the trough where the water falls into the bowl. Now it dribbles when I turn it off and water splashes onto the wood cabinet we have it mounted on. I might end up replacing this later on, or perhaps making a bigger vessel bowl (I'm a potter) to go under it more.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mathiot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: snazzy faucet with old rustic feel but high end materials
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and good quality I love it,the only problem is that stores waters on the faucet
customer_reviews.author: Elp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful faucet
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these great looking faucets. One was perfect. One was leaking through the top of the neck. Really no way of fixing it. The faucet that does work is really nice, heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my facuet
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It was exactly like I expected and it came right when it was supposed to be here
customer_reviews.author: dskiles

customer_reviews.title: The handle broke off 1 month after using it. ...
customer_reviews.text: The handle broke off 1 month after using it...return deadline ran out so I am stuck with t broken faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this faucet looks great and is heavy haven't installed it yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like this, and it seems to be a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Like this, and it seems to be a good value for the price. We will install it soon and hopefully will love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks good, but not worth the noise
customer_reviews.text: this faucet is extremely loud. looks good, but not worth the noise.
customer_reviews.author: awilder

customer_reviews.title: Great value great quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Heavy. Not cheap. Easy to install. Seriously, I read reviews of it being cheap material etc. it's not. Same quality as the 100.00+ faucets. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: andrew lee

customer_reviews.title: cannot mount to counter top
customer_reviews.text: It is OK, but the manufacture needs to add about 3/4" to the threaded mounting tube that goes thru the counter top. My counter top is 3/4" granett and the tube is to short. I sent a message to the seller to see if he would send me longer ones. Checked with plumbing suppliers in the area do not have a part that I need.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Guinn

customer_reviews.title: ... Single Hole Sink Vessel Lavatory Faucets Tall body look great but have not been installed as this review
customer_reviews.text: Aquafaucet Waterfall Bathroom Faucet Brushed Nickel Single Handle Single Hole Sink Vessel Lavatory Faucets Tall body look great but have not been installed as this review.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Edeker

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Rough edges an
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made with rough edges and was missing the seal.
customer_reviews.author: ame d longwell

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: More than I expected for the price. Works great (be sure not to have your water valve fully open or it might shoot out past the rim of your sink.) Looks beautiful...lots of complements. Construction--not plastic, all metal.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Meischen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and efficient One downside that water remains in the faucet downspout
customer_reviews.author: Parviz O.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as offered and has a great appearance. Appears to be well made
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Faucet gushes water out of sink. Terrible product!!! Very short return period. Waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet G. Martin

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality product and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive our new faucet. This is a quality product and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Just installed about 4 months ago and the handle already snapped off..
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Super high-quality product. It was too tall for my sink, but I'm exchanging for the shorter version because it is an awesome faucet!
customer_reviews.author: lindsay herrell

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a solid built unit. Install was easy. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful truly looks amazing. It makes the bathroom look high end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Well built. Only problem was that it is PATINA versus brushed nickel. However, I told the seller that rather than return it I think it will work out o.k. I am really impressed with the quality for the price. I wish it had instructions also, but I think my husband can figure it out. I would have given five stars had it been the right color.
customer_reviews.author: andrea gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted and works like a charm. Really adds a lot of character to our powder room!
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Great looking faucet
customer_reviews.text: Great looking faucet, great price. Did not come with the pop up drain as it states but still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Storbeck

customer_reviews.title: will work nice with our
customer_reviews.text: We haven't installed it yet, will work nice with our vanity
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: A great price for a faucet with minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: Great price for decently finished faucet. Has some burrs on the inner spout and leaves water in spout when shut off. Water flow is not restricted so it will projectile when turned on full. Having shut of valves half open in an easy fix though. Im happy with the purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rigdon

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty but not completely finished at the weld inside the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty but not completely finished at the weld inside the spigot. Make sure you buy the drain component separately, doesn't come with the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful faucet...exactly what I wanted and needed. Prompt delivery. VERY PLEASED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine R.

product_meta.title: Aquafaucet Waterfall Bathroom Faucet Brushed Nickel Single Handle One Hole Vessel Sink Faucet Lavatory Tall body Commercial
feature_bullets: Solid brass construction ensures quality and reliability
Brushed nickel finish provides a lightly brushed warm grey metallic look
Single-handle bathroom faucet for easy adjustments to a powerful Waterfall stream
Pop Up Drain Without Overflow included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars198 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
